/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The buildings lining the street are tall and modern, their glass and steel facades reflecting the bright sunlight. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun shines brightly, illuminating the scene with a warm glow. The street itself is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Cars and buses can be seen moving along the road, indicating a busy day in the city. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of scale to the scene.
